name: Magnetic Potential
description:
This game was created during the Game Makers Toolkit Game Jam 2021. The theme of this year was Joined together.

In this game the theme was interpreted as magnets that can attract and push away the main character of the game. Explore this puzzle game and figure out how you can use the mechanics of the magnets polarity and strengths to get to the next levels. 

Controls

Use magnets to your advantage to reach your charging station! Clicking on the magnets will activate them. You can rotate your magnets by holding down your left mouse key while clicking on them and dragging. Hover over the magnets to see how far their influence reaches. Press R to restart the level and Q to quit

Game created by : Mariana Alves Monteiro, Nynne Kajs and Elisabeth Sidenius Nordentoft. 

!! IS THE GAME SLOW? !!

If the game is slow you might have to enable webGL in your browser. For Chrome you can go to the advanced browser settings and enable "use hardware acceleration when available". Then go to chrome://flags/ and enable webGL.
